text: De, katɨk Yisɨ Tonimbale Valɨn* balakevekandi, Malia alawiñɨñ, yetɨkɨn Maktalatɨle, yetɨkɨn Jemsɨkɨk wome, valandi katɨk yetɨk melɨn Salome, kavɨla meandu alilaŋguaŋɨn Jisas sɨsɨŋgɨn mulumbaŋgapale anafak kosɨmbɨiye lua wusukeve.16.1 Valan mɨndɨm mfotoŋgo tonmale guam yowove, sɨŋgɨn mandɨvaŋga. Yila anafak kosembɨiye lua sɨŋgɨn mulumbevekandi katɨk sɨŋgɨn wataŋdi mɨŋɨleve. Kavik pavevekandi guamɨk mandɨvevekandi guamɨle maŋgɨk gasak mɨndɨmdi matɨkiŋeve.
